attributes.action: Royals to pay for £1milliin refurbishment of William and Kate's apartment
attributes.additional_details:
The tax payer is expected to pay £1million to refurbish William's apartment in Kensington Palace.
He has a private fortune of £13 million,his father gets £19 milllon per year and the inlaws are worth £30 million.
It is immoral for people with £millions to expect a free handout from the tax payer,especially when thus government is cutting back services to the rest of us.We do not have a £1milliin to spare and certainly shouldn't be giving it to people with more money than any of us will ever see.
